sub_title: Website Coordinator, Brazil, Portugal & Colombia at Oberst BV
summary:
LION - Open Networker 
Nationality: Italian/Brazilian

Bilingual professional (Portuguese and English) with a BSc in Advertising and overall 10 years of experience in media, marketing and account management. I've managed a team with strong exposure in on and offline, working always with Content, Creative and Digital Marketing areas. 
I have successfully developed creative solutions in order to achieve our client’s goals and increase their results and revenue; also developed several media projects from retail and social causes. 

I'm passionate about travel. I lived in Ireland between 2015-2017 in order to improve my business English, have the experience of living abroad and gain international exposure. I also lived in Italy for three months, volunteering in a hostel in Milan, helping and meeting people from all over the world.
 
I’m always interested in hearing from former colleagues, managers, or just interesting professionals, so feel free to contact me if you’d like to connect.

profile_positions.title: Website Coordinator, Brazil, Portugal & Colombia
Content Editor, Brazilian Website
Bilingual Interviewer

profile_positions.description:
-Led a successful team of three people. Worked on several projects at the same time, often for a number of different BTB clients such as Claro Brazil (South Brazilian Branch), Orquídea Alimentos, ESPM Sul, Vipal Borrachas, AES SUL, Pirahy Alimentos, Bontempo, Abrafor and Abradif (both of Ford Brazil). 
-Developed media strategies (on and offline), deciding on the best types of media for specific clients and campaigns. 
-Identified target audiences and analyzed their characteristics, behavior and media habits. Negotiated and monitored media budgets, presenting proposals, including cost schedules, to clients. 
-Be proactive in increasing the number for the company.
-Worked always together with the social media, planning, digital marketing and creative areas.
-Client Account Management; Provided sole account management support to the agency's big client "Claro Telecommunications" (South Brazilian Branch) in a partnership with Ogilvy & Mather (São Paulo/Brazil); Improved customer trust relationships by acting quickly to resolve issues and enhancing their success; Built strong, long-term client relationships and maintain frequent contact; Set offline strategies for your assigned customers, considering their specific requirements; Competitively Negotiates media; Created successful customized media strategies for maximum profitability.

**Achievements: 
-Promoted to Media manager due to outstanding work performance and upgrade of management skills.
-Managed one of the biggest and most important client of the company for 3 years with outstanding and positive feedback.
-Ensured ongoing and consistent customer satisfaction by providing on-time delivery and follow-up.
profile_positions.title: Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
-Worked on few projects at the same time, often for a number of different BTB clients such as Claro Brazil (South Brazilian Branch), ESPM Sul, FMP, Vipal Borrachas, AES SUL, Pirahy Alimentos, Bontempo and Abradif (Ford Brazil). 
-Identify target audiences and understand their behavior and habits.
-Determine the best media outlet mix for our campaigns.
-Optimize ad campaigns according to geographic exposure, frequency, time spans and more.
-Allocate budgets and monitor costs.
-Coordinating, monitoring and evaluating media campaigns and strategies.
-Follow media trends of online and offline outlets (TV shows, magazines, blogs, radio programs)

**Achievements: 
-Promoted to Media manager due to outstanding work performance and upgrade of management skills.
-Awards: Top of media 2014 (Rio Grande do Sul/Brazil) - Category: Internet campaign / Case: #UsaiBolt / Client: Instituto da Criança com Diabetes (Children's Institute with Diabetes)
profile_positions.title: Media Executive

profile_positions.description:
-Responsible for making budgets and choosing the best ways for placing and materializing the advertisement. I worked for differents clients such as G. Paniz, Cotrisal and Inbrape.  
-Negotiated all pricing to meet budget guidelines, maintained vendor relations and sourced new partners. Allocated budgets and monitor costs.
-Managed all printing projects including brochures, newsletters and posters; and oversaw publications inventory and archiving process.
-Managed all audio and videos projects including TV comercial, spot for radio, videos web.
-Accountable for the overall quality and timeliness of the production of graphic signage.
-Resolved conflicts and provided solutions in a professional manner to the satisfaction of clients.
-Identify target audiences and understand their behavior and habits.
-Determine the best media outlet mix for our campaigns.
-Optimize ad campaigns according to geographic exposure, frequency, time spans and more.
-Coordinated, monitored and evaluated media campaigns and strategies.

volunteer_experiences.description: When I arrived in Dublin, I tried to find some ways to approach the culture and understand the people there. In this case, we helped a elderly gentleman suffering from alcoholism and depression. We made general gardening and other small chores.
